Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory310.png'}
{3: 'The sound of children laughing and running can be heard in the freshly renovated abandoned mall.'}
{2: 'Ann', 3: 'Hold it, let me put this one!', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Nanami', 3: "Hey, wait! Stop chasing Xi, you're gonna startle them!", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Xiuyong', 3: 'Then tell them to stay put for a second, Nanami!', 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Nanami', 3: "That's up to them! And if you wanna be friends with Xi, you should try to be gentler!", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Ann', 3: 'Nanami... Should we pat them the way you do?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Xiuyong', 3: "Argh... But Xi don't want to come close to us at all...", 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Nanami', 3: "Give them time! Whether it's getting interested in humans, or getting close to them...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: "It's gonna be a process! Yep! That's how it is!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: "You're cute, sure, but those critters are just like you! They're new to the world, and everything is unfamiliar!", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Ann', 3: "So... they're also... children?", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Nanami', 3: "You can say that! Newly born, they're just starting to be aware of the world... just like you!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: "You have to get along with each other, just like what you're doing now!", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Deckard', 3: "Nanami, they're trying to run away again! I-I still have something else I want to give them!", 4: '3'}
{2: 'Ann', 3: 'Shh! Deckard, quieter! Do what Nanami just said—take your time!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Xiuyong', 3: 'Taking my time, taking my time... Um, Nanami...', 4: '2'}
{3: 'The children turn around and look at Nanami, who is deep in thought.'}
{3: 'Like being suddenly snapped awake, Nanami joins their fray with utmost excitement as the children look at her with anticipation.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Nanami', 3: "Alright, if you want to get along with them, Nanami can't sit by and do nothing!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: 'Leave it to the almighty Nanami!', 4: '1'}
{3: 'She gently pats the small approaching mechanoids and gestures to the children to pass her the decorations they made.'}
{3: 'The festivity-loving Xi gather around with Nanami and the children, and they look especially precious in the apocalyptic world.'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: '...If only we could keep playing like this for the rest of this year.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Nanami falls backward onto the stacks of gifts and red envelopes, and she gazes at the sky, her mind adrift.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Nanami', 3: 'Hmm? Ayla? Hello!', 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryTongxunHalfNew.prefab', 3: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Ayla', 3: "Hello! Nanami, it's been a while! Are you on a mission to the surface?", 4: '2'}
{3: 'Nanami tilts her head and thinks, looking at the Xi running everywhere.'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: '...Sort of? I guess this is a mission, more or less... You know what? Yeah, Nanami is indeed on an important mission!', 4: '1'}
{3: "Ayla does not pay much attention to Nanami's speech to herself. She just takes out a pair of red couplets from her bag."}
{2: 'Ayla', 3: "I was trying to find you in your room earlier today only to find out you weren't there. I've prepared some New Year decorations for you!", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: "Couplets! They're so well written! Did you write them, Ayla?", 4: '1'}

{2: 'Ayla', 3: "Of course not. It's from Yuan Ye, the CUB who was with you. Asimov said that being in contact with you guys has introduced it information on Lunar New Year, but I don't really understand what he was saying.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: "I see! I can't believe that it's not just cute, it's also super smart!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Ayla', 3: "Right? I also think it's cute, but nobody seems to appreciate it... By the way, do you want me to put the couplets on for you?", 4: '2'}
{3: 'She thinks for a second before shaking her head.'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: 'Maybe not!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: "Nanami wants to go back to Babylonia to do it herself! That's what makes it meaningful!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Ayla', 3: "Alright, then. I'll leave them on your desk!", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Ayla', 3: 'II have to head to my next stop to give out more couplets. Goodbye, Nanami! Happy New Year!', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: 'Happy New Year, Ayla!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryTongxunHalfNew.prefab', 4: '2'}
{3: 'Nanami does a kip-up from the pile after she hangs up, and she stands steadily on the ground.'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: 'In that case, Nanami has to take a trip to Babylonia, or else it would be very impolite!', 4: '1'}

{3: 'Nanami is not sure why her free-spirited self needs to find an excuse to convince herself to return to Babylonia—perhaps something has changed, or maybe nothing has—not her, not Babylonia. Regardless...'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: "I get to see everyone again! That's wonderful... Maybe I should pull a prank on the commandant again! What do I do this time...", 4: '1'}
